name: Sebastian Mego
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
Hello,

 My name is Sebastian Mego. Im currently a bud tender working for a Pre-Ico Collective in Mid City on Pico Blvd. I've been working there for a little over a year and love the industry. I have great people skills and can multi task not to mention very clean. Im extremely organized, punctual, and have reliable transportation. I am also knowledgeable about different strains, products, and also a very fast learner. Last but not least I also have strong math skill. What I know I can bring to your company is great customer service, honesty, punctuality and being the best I can be. Thank you to whom it may concern and I appreciate your time. I hope to hear from you soon!
experience:
CHC PICO, May 2016- Current

   • Assisting social media   

   • Cleaning (whipping down counters, washing jars, organizing)

   • Answering phones 

   • Taking Inventory (make sure we are fully stocked with medicine bags, containers, and products)

   • Customer Service 

   • Sales (Accepting donations and giving change)

   • Extensive knowledge in 420 soft
additionalInfo: Some additional points about myself I am definitely a team player. I'm a very fast learner. I know being in this industry there is constant change. I'm focused and a hard worker!
